name: Command & Conquer: Renegade
description:
Command & Conquer: Renegade is an action-shooter game developed by Westwood Studios. It came out on 25-02-2002. Electronic Arts published the game. On review aggregator Metacritic, Command & Conquer: Renegade has a score of 75. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Command & Conquer: Renegade is available on PC.
Frank Klepacki scored the game.
